ECLECTIC LEFTFIELD BEATS

HELIOS RAY contains three divergent styles of drum kits. The Vinyl Kits represent a crate diggerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s paradise Ã¢â‚¬â€œ dirty, off-kilter hip-hop sampled from dusty grooves, with vinyl kicks, finger snaps, shakers, vocal samples, claps, snares, crackle and record stops.

Drawing influence from the leftfield, future-leaning side of hip-hop, nu jazz and broken beat, HELIOS RAY provides the tools to deviate from the mainstream Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a stunning array of crunchy analog drums and Latin percussion, jazz guitar, vintage Rhodes licks, and custom MASSIVE presets. This MASCHINE Expansion brings LAÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tripped-out abstract beats and the loose, soulful vibe of LondonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s innovative broken beat scene to MASCHINE and MASCHINE MIKRO.

The Digital Kits feature Brazilian and Latin percussion such as shakers, bongos and congas, as well as stunning, warm basses. The Analog Kits represent the switched-on side of HELIOS RAY, with classic drums and percussion providing the gritty bite of hardware.
